snippet.title: UFL™ Journey #5 | Commentators
snippet.description:
Episode #5: Commentators

Today we’re going to take a deep dive into commentary and localization 🎙️

Uncover how our team plans to bring an electrifying atmosphere & authentic commentary straight to your speakers and headphones 🎧

Chapters:
00:00 Intro
00:51 Language list
01:22 Commentary system overview
02:38 In-game system demonstration
05:07 Keeping commentary up to date
06:20 Game VS. Reality
07:27 Every broadcast is unique
09:09 AI & Localization
10:29 Achieving a sense of realism
12:08 Rare but important events
12:35 Variety VS. Consistency
13:44 Dynamic event-driven system


#UFL #UFLJourney #UFLgame
